INSTALL_MSG:
Done.
*Make sure you have the standard weather cog unloaded and a API key provided.
NAME: weatherMs
SHORT: A modified version of the community's weather cog. by rfilkins1992, Dex & Will.
DESCRIPTION:
Returns the temp/humidity information in a given location.
Requires API key obtainable from www.wunderground.com/weather/api/
